results.original_title: Alien: Covenant - Prologue: The Secrets of David’s Lab
results.title: Alien: Covenant - Prologue: The Secrets of David’s Lab

results.overview: Aao Pyar Karen is a movie directed by R. K. Nayyar featuring Joy Mukherjee, Saira Banu.
results.title: Aao Pyaar Karein

results.overview: Mirko and Manolo are best friends and live in the suburbs of Rome. They both live in poor conditions with their single parents, are still in school and struggle with occasional odd jobs to make ends meet. Together they share dreams of women, of sex and money, of a better life to come. Then, after killing a man in a hit-and-run one night, they get involved with the local mafia and their lives change dramatically.
results.title: Boys Cry

results.original_title: Confession of a Child of the Century
results.overview: Paris, 1830: Octave, betrayed by his mistress, sinks into despair and debauchery. His father's death leads him to the country where he meets Brigitte, a widow who is ten years his elder. Octave falls in love passionately, but will he have the courage to believe in it?
results.title: Confession of a Child of the Century

results.original_title: Wee Singdom: The Land of Music and Fun
results.overview: Wee Sing characters Punchinello, Sillywhim, Little Bunny Foo Foo, Weeber, Snoodle and Doodle, and Trunky (originally Tusky) who are all from earlier Wee Sing Videos, ride the Wee Sing Train to Singalingaland where Singaling (voiced by Mikey Moran) and Warbly (voiced by Maureen Robinson) are hosting a big musical party called "The Wee Sing Festival". Singalingaland also happens to be an extension of Tim and Annie’s game board, Wee Singdom. However, the main guest of honor (a singing rainbow) is missing, so as each character performs his or her respective performance, Chug-a-Long the engine and Cubby the caboose are sent to go look for her by asking a cirrus, stratus, cumulus cloud where she disappeared too. Eventually, she is found after Tim and Annie find her playing with their cat friend, Staccato, and as a reward, Chug-a-long and Cubby invited Annie and Tim and Staccato to attend the Wee Sing Festival, and Singing Rainbow is able to perform.
results.title: Wee Sing: Wee Singdom The Land of Music and Fun

results.overview: Léon, André, Christiane and Monique, who all study drama, decide to go camping together. Unfortunately - although unsurprisingly - their old jalopy breaks down on the road. Chance has it that in the village where they are stranded a historical movie is being shot by famed director Médéric, starring sexpot Barbara Glamour and Latin heartthrob Edouardo Tocato. Two of the young people start flirting with the two film stars until their friends make them see reason : they love each other. The four of them end up being hired as extras and all is well that ends well.
results.title: This Age Without Pity

results.original_title: La civilisation à travers les âges
results.overview: An episodic narrative displaying examples of humankind's brutality, from the story of Cain and Abel through the Hague Convention of 1907.
results.title: Humanity Through the Ages

results.original_title: Rompeolas y visita a la escuadra inglesa
results.overview: Documentary filmed by Fructuoso Gelabert at the Spanish coast.
results.title: Breakwater and the Visit of the English Squadron

results.overview: Marco, an impoverished engineering student, hides his wealthy friend Andre at his apartment in a fake kidnaping plot to obtain money from Andre's father, a furniture manufacturer.
results.title: The Accomplices

results.original_title: Alice Guy tourne une phonoscène sur la théâtre de pose des Buttes-Chaumont
results.overview: Behind-the-scenes footage showing Alice Guy directing an early sound film.
results.title: Alice Guy Films a 'Phonoscène' in the Studio at Buttes-Chaumont, Paris

results.overview: A broken down ex-rodeo cowboy, Roper, is down on his luck. He has three weeks to pay three months rent when he reads about the couple of the year in the newspaper, and decides to kidnap the wife, Goodwina for ransom. Goodie is the sweetest country girl ever, and she married a country boy, only to have him change into a city politician who is sleeping with his assistant. He mocks her for her country ways. After Roper kidnaps Goodie, They initially hate each other (understandably so), but when Roper calls in for a ransom, her husband tells him that he doesn't want her back.
results.title: Alabama Love Story

results.overview: A magician takes a simple-minded runaway under his wing. But the magician's wife has a sinister idea for the easily manipulated young man.
results.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents: The Sorcerer's Apprentice

results.overview: A former special-forces soldier is given the opportunity to bring the man who betrayed his team on their final mission in Eastern Europe several years ago - to justice.
results.title: I Am Vengeance: Retaliation

results.original_title: Sword of the Valiant: The Legend of Sir Gawain and the Green Knight
results.overview: Gawain was a squire in King Arthur's court when the Green Knight burst in and offered to play a game with a brave knight. Gawain journeys across the land, learning about life, saving damsels, and solving the Green Knight's riddle.
results.title: Sword of the Valiant: The Legend of Sir Gawain and the Green Knight

results.original_title: Almanach des adresses des demoiselles de Paris
results.overview: During the French Revolution, a young aristocrat finds an almanac in a book store which contains the prettiest and strangest prostitutes living in Paris.
results.title: Almanac of Addresses of the Ladies of Paris

results.overview: Against all advice, a destitute Brazilian old man marries a nineteen-year-old girl. Because he can’t give her any children, he moves to the interior to make money, so she will at least have a good life. When he returns, he is told she has a three-year-old daughter. He buys himself a knife. Suspense movie with a combination of ethnography, adventure and dramatic action, based on a poem by the Brazilian writer Odylo Costa Filho.
results.title: João and the Knife

results.overview: Arante Mulla Kochu Mulla is a Malayalam family film released in the year 1984. It is directed by Balachandra Menon, starring Balachandra Menon, Shankar, Srividya, and Laksmi. The film is noted for the performances of the late Srividya and Laksmi, who portray sisters-in-law.
results.title: Arante Mulla Kochu Mulla

results.overview: Italian-made ripoff of SATURDAY NIGHT FEVER.
results.title: American Fever

results.overview: When she was six, Suzanne Hollander saw her mother kill her father. Twenty-five years later, she's a professor of psychology and lives in fear of becoming a criminal like her mother. As she teaches a course at the university, gunfire breaks out on campus, causing several casualties. The shooter is one of her former students with whom she had many conversations about his thesis, on the assessment of empathy. The young man, named Connor, is a dangerous psychopath who keeps the track to declare his love.
results.title: A Deadly Obsession

results.original_title: The Invasion of the Arab Armies - May 1948
results.overview: A documentary film which portrays the dramatic chain of events leading to the invasion of the Arab armies to Israel after the Israeli declaration of independence. The film includes original pictures from the war filmed by both sides, and documentation of the leaders of the Arab forces and the Yishuv in the crucial moments of Israel's "War of Independence".
results.title: The Invasion of the Arab Armies - May 1948
